DOC.brief_summary: The main aim study ( 1 ) examine impact contralateral strength training quadriceps muscle function ACL surgery ( 2 ) compare magnitude cross-education induce NMES versus eccentric strength training .
DOC.brief_title: Contralateral Strength-training After Anterior Cruciate Ligament ( ACL ) Reconstruction
DOC.criteria: patient schedule ACL reconstruction surgery Concomitant low limb injury disorder previous low extremity open surgery contralateral low limb cardiac disease pregnancy
